clean_data: SR ORACLE DATABASE ADMINISTOR SR ORACLE span lDATABASEspan ADMINISTOR SR ORACLE DATABASE ADMINISTOR DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE Fort Washington MD Certified Oracle Database Administrator with 10 years experience in Oracle Database Administration Installation Configuration Patch Installation Migration Upgrades Backup and Recovery Cloning Replication Database Security Memory Management Data Modelling Performance Monitoring and Tuning RAC Data Guard Grid Control Oracle Streams In addition I am familiar with Federal Continuity Directive 1 Federal Executive Branch National Continuity Program and Requirements I have knowledge of related NIST Presidential policy Executive orders and other Federal Continuity Directives I am a competitive achiever who can successfully manage multiple priorities and perform under pressure in a fastpaced rapidly changing environment I possess exceptional written verbal analytical and organizational abilities and a solid reputation for collaborating with highly motivated teams and retaining the development of innovative solutions Work Experience SR ORACLE DATABASE ADMINISTOR DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE January 2018 to Present Monitored daily alert log files for production Oracle databases on BIS systems Performed Oracle DBA activities such as backup export and import table space management table partitions user management security management installations and upgrades Ensured all oracle database storage and backup are functioning correctly Patched databases quarterly in both production and development environments Performed daily operational network system checks Reviewed and analyzed daily application interface jobs Provided weekly statistics to the application support team to track the number of registrations and validations for applications Performed monthly data load from staging to production environment Provided extended customer support internal and external to related applications including in a timely manner including ticket creating updates and resolutions Managed passwords for all production application test accounts every 90 days Managed passwords for all applications related to database schemas every 90 days Support the application team with version releases database troubleshooting and related activities Completed baselines for the systems by utilizing DISA STIGS Advice senior managers on identified risks issues and opportunities for the systems including development of contingency plans ORACLE DATABASE ADMINISTRATOR DEPARTMENT OF STATE May 2009 to January 2018 Daily incremental backup and weekly full backup of databases using RMAN Loading data into database tables using SQL Loader Implemented Materialized views database links Regular database management on 10g and 11g OEM Performed daytoday activities such as creating users roles schemas tables views indexes and rebuilding Indexes and running scripts given by the clients Frequently monitor emails in regards to any database issues Responsible for quarterly patches maintainingmonitoringupgrading the production and test Databases for products Setupconfigured oracle RMAN for database backup and recovery Application of different recovery procedures for complete and incomplete recoveries depending on the type of failure by using exportimport scripts Restore and Recover of database from offline online and RMAN backup Responsible for the administration of a highly available web logics database solution supporting over 200 concurrent users in a VERITAS Cluster Conduct DISA procedures to ensure system integrity and security Performing DaytoDay DBA tasks performance tuning database design system security database installation configuration patching technical database support in 24X7 environments to ensure system performance and stability Table space monitoring Performance monitoring and tuning for performance improvement Granting roles and privileges to end users Managing troubleshooting and resolving oracle database and application issues Upgraded databases from Oracle 11g to Oracle 12c Configured and maintain Oracle Golden Gate 12c for data replication between Oracle databases Configured unidirectional data replication for OBIEE 12c data warehouse using Oracle GoldenGate 12c Education BACHELOR OF ART in SOCIOLOGY UNIVERSITY OF MARYLAND EASTERN SHORE May 2008 BACHELOR OF SCIENCE in SOCIAL WORK SALISBURY UNIVERSITY May 2008 Skills Mysql Oracle Oracle 10g Plsql Sql Rman Red hat Unix Linux Shell scripting Unix shell Html Javascript Scripting Rdbms Oem Windows 2000 Additional Information SKILLS RDBMS Oracle 10g 11g 12c LANGUAGES HTML JavaScript HTML PLSQL SQL UNIX Shell Scripting MySQL OPERATING SYSTEMS Linux Unix RED HAT LINUX Windows 2000 Server Windows 2007 server TUNING UTILITIES OEM SQL Plus Data Pump RMAN AWS ADDM
